entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Nordegg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nordegg 10:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %

Wind: SE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
